name: Air Hockey Wear - Watch Game
description:
How to play on Apple Watch?
Use the "Digital Crown" wheel to move horizontally. Touch the screen to attack. Wins the first who score 7 goals.

For iPhone, swipe the screen to move. Score 7 goals!

Minimal design to avoid energy consumption and of course, with dark mode.

View our privacy policy: https://tocapp.com/legal-apps/legal-air-hockey-wear.html#privacity
View our terms of service: https://tocapp.com/legal-apps/legal-air-hockey-wear.html#terms
Need help with the game? support@tocapp.com
